other_tests.findings: Normalization of blood pressure and good compliance with glucocorticoid and androgen substitutive therapies post-surgery.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Blood pressure progressively returned to normal and stayed at 120/80 mm Hg even after removal of antihypertensive medications. Eighteen months post-surgery, a new echocardiogram showed regression of concentric ventricular hypertrophy.

other_tests.procedure_name: RT-PCR and sequencing of CYP11B1 mRNA
other_tests.findings: Expression of a shorter mRNA that lacked exon 8 and did not contain the exon 5 mutation or exon 1 and 2 polymorphisms. Very low 11β-hydroxylase activity was shown.

other_tests.procedure_name: Western blot analysis of adrenal CYP11B
other_tests.findings: Weak expression of a shorter CYP11B immunoreactive band of 43 kDa, consistent with truncation of exon 8.
Pronounced concentric ventricular hypertrophy (septum wall, 16–20 mm; posterior wall, 12–14 mm) consistent with uncontrolled hypertension.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Eighteen months post-surgery, echocardiogram showed regression of concentric ventricular hypertrophy.
